modShortDescription: This mod adds the old pigs back into the game.
modDescription:
This mod adds the old [pigs](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-animals/) back into the game.

## Changelog

Bugfixes. Thanks to xxx73 for reporting harvesting issues!

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/doughphunghus/7D2D-Doughs-Khelldons-Mods-a19/tree/main/Khelldon-GetPiggy)** for A19  
**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/doughphunghus/7D2D-Doughs-Khelldons-Mods-a18/tree/main/Khelldon-GetPiggy)** for A18

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/17197-doughs-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Khelldon](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/khelldon/), [Doughphunghus](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/doughphunghus/)
